title: In Stereo. Official Featurette [HD] (2015)
description:
In theaters: July 3rd, 2015

Description:

David and Brenda are perfect for each other, and everyone knows it except David and Brenda. After a break-up, they each experience their own rough patch. For David, a self-destructive artistic endeavor and a relationship with an immature beautyÃ¢â‚¬â€for Brenda, a failing acting career, an eviction notice, and a boyfriend who just doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t do it for her. A chance encounter brings them together on the streets of New York at a particularly bad time. David invites Brenda to the opening of his first photography exhibit and the stage is set for a night of drinking and flirting which leads to an untraditional proposal of how they can be together without getting back together. A sharply observed, un-romantic comedy by writer/director Mel Rodriguez III, IN STEREO is a stylish and striking first feature that offers an unflinching look at the complexity of modern relationships.

Director: Mel Rodriguez III

Writers: Mel Rodriguez III

Actors: Beau Garrett, Micah Hauptman, Mario Cantone, Melissa Bolona, Sean Cullen, Kieran Campion, Aimee Mullins, Maggie Geha

Genre: Comedy, Romance

Run Time: 1 hour 35 minutes
